page.title: 04THE GAMEKEEPER
page.content: {Mr.Knight }is now the only gamekeeper employed on Mr.Buxton's land.His job is to look after game and the pheasant chicks which he rears,from foxes,weasels and stoats.The pheasants are bred for shooting by invited guests.Beaters make a lot of noise which frightens the birds into the air where they are shot.Mr. Knight's labrador and spaniel are used to retrieve the birds.He also has a fierce rotweiler dog which is used to frighten poachers who come in gangs to steal the pheasants. {Mr.Knight}catches rabbits which destroy crops.Last yearover 2,000 rabbits were killed.Traps,snares and ferrets are used to catch rabbits. {Mr.Knight}has lived in the country all his life.He enjoys his work and says that each season of the year brings new challenges.
